SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, claim_type, sp_claim_category, effective_date, expiration_date, value_type, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, sp_claim_type_id FROM elp_sp_claim_types WHERE sp_claim_type_id = :sp_claim_type_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_sp_claim_types SET code = :code, claim_type = :claim_type, sp_claim_category = :sp_claim_category, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, value_type = :value_type, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE sp_claim_type_id = :sp_claim_type_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_sp_claim_types ( code, claim_type, sp_claim_category, effective_date, expiration_date, value_type, created_by, sp_claim_type_id ) VALUES ( :code, :claim_type, :sp_claim_category, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :value_type, :created_by, :sp_claim_type_id )
SQL.LOAD_BASED_ON_SP_CODE: SELECT code, claim_type, sp_claim_category, effective_date, expiration_date, value_type, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, sp_claim_type_id FROM elp_sp_claim_types where code = :code
